Detailed Description

Header file that exposes the public interface of BGP Stream Prefix objects.

Author
Chiara Orsini

Definition in file bgpstream_utils_pfx.h.

typedef struct struct_bgpstream_pfx_t bgpstream_pfx_t

A generic BGP Stream Prefix.

Must only be used for casting to the appropriate type based on the address version

bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_t *  pfx2 
)

Compare two IPv4 prefixes for equality.

Parameters
pfx1pointer to the first prefix to compare
pfx2pointer to the second prefix to compare
Returns
0 if the prefixes are not equal, non-zero if they are equal

char* bgpstream_pfx_snprintf ( char *  buf,
size_t  len,
bgpstream_pfx_t *  pfx 
)

Write the string representation of the given prefix into the given character buffer.

Parameters
bufpointer to a character buffer at least len bytes long
lenlength of the given character buffer
pfxpointer to the bgpstream pfx to convert to string
returnsa pointer to buf if successful, NULL otherwise

You will likely want to use INET_ADDRSTRLEN+3 or INET6_ADDRSTRLEN+3 to dimension the buffer.
